title: Sorry to waste your time! but I have to know
body:
Do you guys hate Talon? Be honest with me. Does the lead designers at riot hate Talon? /:
I would love to know the reasoning behind Jhin, a hardly human looking champion, getting a project skin over Talon, a human with hair, a bladed weapon and perfect abilities for project. 
I'm just so deeply saddened by this for I have been waiting for a project talon skin for 3 years.

replies.body:
I would say he just got blood moon but...

so did Jhin {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Awwww we definitely don't hate Talon! I mean heck, he got dem sweet parkour moves going after all xD!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GlEktEr3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-07T02:20:41.607+0000)
>
> Awwww we definitely don't hate Talon! I mean heck, he got dem sweet parkour moves going after all xD!

My man!! Knew I loved you. (Not to sound weird) dude I love talon TO DEATH. He's my favorite character in literally anything ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GlEktEr3,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-07T04:45:14.144+0000)
>
> I mean.....does anyone *NOT* love poros o_O lol
> 
> Srsly though, I love muh boi Talon! When I first saw him teased I immediately thought about Altair and was all-in. When they updated him for super flashy parkour.....
> 
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Poros get me through sad days <3 love them to death. But yeah, loved him since day 1! He's actually the reason I started playing league! I'd do anything for that old rake and old shadow assault
